title: Actress Sanjeewani Weerasinghe hooted and chased away by Lankans from protest in LA
body_lines: Popular actress Sanjeewani Weerasinghe had been asked to leave from a protest organized by a group of Sri Lankans in Los Angeles, USA, held against the government and the President.
It is reported that the protesters hooted at her and chased her away.
The actress who came to join a protest, was met with public displeasure, demanding that she leave the protest.
The Protesters pointed out that Sanjeewani Weerasinghe had supported President Gotabaya Rajapaksa during the Presidential Elections.(DSB)
